title: The Role of MDX in Physical AI Documentation
description: As Physical AI and humanoid robotics become increasingly complex, effective documentation is crucial. This post explores how MDX, a superset of Markdown that lets you embed JSX, can significantly enhance the quality and interactivity of Physical AI documentation.

tags.label: Physical AI
tags.description: Discussions and insights on Physical AI concepts.

tags.label: Documentation
tags.description: Best practices and tools for documenting Physical AI projects.
